samples.comment: I've had issues with my Link for a long time. I was told, because it's under warranty, I could get it replaced. But I've had to email several times to see the status and I'm still waiting for the replacement. It's getting frustrating. Other than this issue I've loved Positive Grid products.

I don’t think the person who responded really read my email. I felt completely unappreciated as a customer.  Feel like a complete fool for even making a second order (which I have).  Getting a $20 discount code instead of the $70 difference between my purchase (which WAS described as your “Black Friday special”. - a “carry bag”?  WhoTF needs that?) and the price offered 2 days later feels like the LOWEST effort possible.  I was (and still am) SOOOO tempted to just return the whole thing and buy it again at the Black Friday price.  Whatever.

I notified you folks immediately upon receiving confirmation that I had placed two orders for the same thing in error.  Zero effort was made on your part to cancel one order even though I provided order numbers for the one to cancel and the one to process.  The order was shipped three days later so the excuse that these orders get processed quickly is bogus.  Instead I was told to refuse the order at the door or send it back for a refund.  Awful customer service.  I will be returning both for a full refund.

Information was precise,yet incredibly disappointing. I bought 4 cabs,then discover you offer no covers for protection. My options are either take them out and watch the damage daily,or keep them home and eventually get rid of them. Have decided to keep them at home. Such a good product,such a shame.
AI response was totally inaccurate and no option / process to get a 'human' reply. Really disappointing.

The bot has responded in a reassuring way, but the problem was not resolved. 
By the way, it's a problem with PG's product listing - more of your sales issue than an issue in my end.
AI support is just lazy. A human could have stopped that order well within the time it actually shipped. Not remotely impressed.
I was told to wait for a software update again. No solution.
The fast response was good.  The response being AI generated is fine.  The link in the email didn't work.  I'd still like the link to adjust the devices I have the Spark amp on.  Thanks.
Dealt with by AI, I can see the package has not even been given to Royal Mail yet, and they update their site as soon as received
I prefer human support over ai generated „help“. Other than that the problem was kind if solved, even though it was very disappointing that there was no way to correct a wrong shipping address.

It takes three days to get a response to each email. Trying to resolve an issue by email, the only way you are prepared to communicate with us, takes weeks as a result! The product itself is great in theory but so temperamental I have not had to return three! I would not buy another nor recommend a positive grid product to a friend

Having my question answered wrongly by an AI rather than a real person doesn’t feel like good customer service to me - vey impersonal. I haven’t had the chance to try my Spark 2 yet but it looks superb. I don’t doubt the quality and ingenuity of your products!
Felt misled by an advertisement that offered a free trial, AI only responds and does not care about the customer.
I will never purchase any products from  the Postive Grid Amazon store again. Will warn others not to as well.

For 2 months maybe more we were going back and forth, they did sent me a replacement but it did the same noise as mine, and then instead in the end keep that one too they wanted me to return both and get a refund and 20 $ coupon as a discount.... that is embarrasing...just to have your customer satisfy just let him keep both product to not complain after 3 months of frustartion.

AI customer service. 
 I will not purchase another product from Positive Grid !

Devin didn't answer my question and there is no way I can contact a human for help. I get that AI is all the rage now but you need to give me another way to get an answer.  Devin sends me back to your site which did not answer my question in the first place.  I would appreciate contact with a human, especially since I purchased a spark.
I appreciate the prompt responses and reminder emails - but I do not want to receive AI emails.

As I have said before there r a lot of people who do not have access to a Windows 8 on laptop & most company owned laptops do not allow access to download firmware from outside vendors. 
Find a way to upgrade using iOS with iPad or iPhone

allComments.comment: I've had issues with my Link for a long time. I was told, because it's under warranty, I could get it replaced. But I've had to email several times to see the status and I'm still waiting for the replacement. It's getting frustrating. Other than this issue I've loved Positive Grid products.
There could have been other steps taken to solve problem. But, I understand the time it takes and the effort, to the company, is just not worth it.

I don’t think the person who responded really read my email. I felt completely unappreciated as a customer.  Feel like a complete fool for even making a second order (which I have).  Getting a $20 discount code instead of the $70 difference between my purchase (which WAS described as your “Black Friday special”. - a “carry bag”?  WhoTF needs that?) and the price offered 2 days later feels like the LOWEST effort possible.  I was (and still am) SOOOO tempted to just return the whole thing and buy it again at the Black Friday price.  Whatever.

I notified you folks immediately upon receiving confirmation that I had placed two orders for the same thing in error.  Zero effort was made on your part to cancel one order even though I provided order numbers for the one to cancel and the one to process.  The order was shipped three days later so the excuse that these orders get processed quickly is bogus.  Instead I was told to refuse the order at the door or send it back for a refund.  Awful customer service.  I will be returning both for a full refund.
Fast response but no real resolution. I just wanted to change my billing address to match my shipping address. I still don’t know how to do this. I love your products!

You left out " INSUFFICIENT PRODUCT SUPPORT" - Customer support is terrible. Your product is very impressive, but you need to publish a support number and have actual phone support, especially NO off-shore support.

Information was precise,yet incredibly disappointing. I bought 4 cabs,then discover you offer no covers for protection. My options are either take them out and watch the damage daily,or keep them home and eventually get rid of them. Have decided to keep them at home. Such a good product,such a shame.
AI response was totally inaccurate and no option / process to get a 'human' reply. Really disappointing.
software is a gimmick and cannot be returned

I was somewhat dissatisfied with the number of communications required to reach a resolution and the time it took.
However, I am very grateful and satisfied that responses were prompt and that you ultimately supported me until the issue was resolved.

I logged a call on November 3rd.  It wasn't resolved until November 24th.  And that was just to get me set up in the product support data base as the rightful owner of the unit.  Then your company makes it as hard as possible to log a support call.  I have very LOW confidence that I'll get the support I need to make ownership of the Spark 2 a success for me.
There is no way to cancel an order - even it is not fulfilled or shipped. That wastes ressouces, time, money and energy

The bot has responded in a reassuring way, but the problem was not resolved. 
By the way, it's a problem with PG's product listing - more of your sales issue than an issue in my end.
AI support is just lazy. A human could have stopped that order well within the time it actually shipped. Not remotely impressed.
I was told to wait for a software update again. No solution.
Not Good
The fast response was good.  The response being AI generated is fine.  The link in the email didn't work.  I'd still like the link to adjust the devices I have the Spark amp on.  Thanks.
Dealt with by AI, I can see the package has not even been given to Royal Mail yet, and they update their site as soon as received
I prefer human support over ai generated „help“. Other than that the problem was kind if solved, even though it was very disappointing that there was no way to correct a wrong shipping address.

It takes three days to get a response to each email. Trying to resolve an issue by email, the only way you are prepared to communicate with us, takes weeks as a result! The product itself is great in theory but so temperamental I have not had to return three! I would not buy another nor recommend a positive grid product to a friend
I received a very obviously used amp
No one has yet gotten back to me

Having my question answered wrongly by an AI rather than a real person doesn’t feel like good customer service to me - vey impersonal. I haven’t had the chance to try my Spark 2 yet but it looks superb. I don’t doubt the quality and ingenuity of your products!

Support was ok but the idea a product I purchased directly from you wasn’t eligible for upgrade as I couldn’t access it to get serial number (snowbird Rv’er away from home) is bogus. Went with another brand
I was told my product shipped, but the tracking says it has not.
Felt misled by an advertisement that offered a free trial, AI only responds and does not care about the customer.
You sent me the wrong product

Thought the solutions I have received do work. I have to do the steps every single day to use my amp. Some days it takes more time than other days to actually connect to tone control. It's infuriating. And I'm not sure if this is just a problem with my Pixel Pro trying to communicate with the spark app. Or if its a hardware compatibility problem. I never had these issues with my old Samsung S20. The Spark Mini is a fantastic piece of hardware. I love it, and it fits beautifully on my desk top. But I'm growing extremely irritated with the persisting problem I'm having.
I will never purchase any products from  the Postive Grid Amazon store again. Will warn others not to as well.

I got into using spark and got the spark control to find it very limited. As such I don’t use it. Then you come up with control x but no upgrade path. Unlike the spark2 upgrade path which only gives the customer 10 more watts. Sorry but the control x new. So while I was looking at the spark2. If I have to buy control x new as well….. I likely will go to another vendor. Ps having issues with the mini cutting out and choppy when battery gets low which occurs in just an hour at full volume. No longer a proponent of spark

So, the Spark GO isn't capable of recognizing a wired microphone. Okay. Seems like a serious missed opportunity, but what do I know? However, suggesting that I consider purchasing another device that costs more than 5x what the device I'd originally purchased is just absolute bonkers. What exactly would make someone think I'd be able to afford the Spark LIVE when I originally submitted a support request for the Spark GO? I mean, I am clearly interested in something that's small, battery powered, and affordable. The Spark LIVE meets 33% of the criteria -- why suggest that to begin with? I dunno. Call me crazy or nitpicky, but I just felt totally misunderstood after reading that. That, and really bummed. Sure, I'd love to be able to purchase an amplifier that costs more than most decent laptops. Just not sure what, aside from me mentioning that I needed something for vocals, would lead someone to be all like "You should totally go with this other thing that is WAY outside of your apparent price point AND entirely overdelivers on what your apparent needs are." Just me? Okay.

For 2 months maybe more we were going back and forth, they did sent me a replacement but it did the same noise as mine, and then instead in the end keep that one too they wanted me to return both and get a refund and 20 $ coupon as a discount.... that is embarrasing...just to have your customer satisfy just let him keep both product to not complain after 3 months of frustartion.
Too many apologies, too many promises. Zero solution.
More then one week Missisauga to Gatineau is not good
I have now had to send this device back four times. I would not recommend your products to anyone

AI customer service. 
 I will not purchase another product from Positive Grid !

I don’t understand why I cannot register a used working Positive Grid Neo that I purchased from eBay. The original buyer is not known but I currently have the device and box in my possession. The product is working great for my needs so far. I wanted to get it registered to insure I get future updates and info on the Neo.
Not your fault, but since I bought on Amazon I cannot register my product. Wish I had known that before I bought.

The solution provided only solved the problem in Mono, when I requested suggestions that would solve the problem in Stereo… I received no response except this survey indicating I was not going to receive further support

Devin didn't answer my question and there is no way I can contact a human for help. I get that AI is all the rage now but you need to give me another way to get an answer.  Devin sends me back to your site which did not answer my question in the first place.  I would appreciate contact with a human, especially since I purchased a spark.
I can't register a used unit
Advertising a price in US$ that then converts to the same number in UK£ is odd and doesn't feel right. I have moved my custom to another company.

Awful!

I asked a simple question and was ignored.

The call ended without any response.
I appreciate the prompt responses and reminder emails - but I do not want to receive AI emails.

As I have said before there r a lot of people who do not have access to a Windows 8 on laptop & most company owned laptops do not allow access to download firmware from outside vendors. 
Find a way to upgrade using iOS with iPad or iPhone

Our order got "stuck" in your system.  We ordered well in advance of when we expected delivery but never received our item.  You don't have a phone number to contact for issues.  Your responses take too long and are usually late into the evening while awaiting answers.  Our agent was AWESOME and completely understood our circumstance and timeline and she did everything to get us a duplicate order which we finally received.  PLEASE CONSIDER AN PHONE NUMBER for real-time assistance.  You're products are too high in demand to not have a customer service department available on weekday business hours.
My problem supposedly escalated a week ago... no updates provided despite several requests for status update. I had to rent amp for gigs because of issues from latest Live firmware update.

I ordered on 11/28 and have been getting the run around ever since. Your staff has blatantly skirted & avoided actually doing the 1 thing I need which is still not done. I need a return authorization number to return 1 item of my multi-item order. PG-217319

I received the replacement set off the Spark Links, and once again there is a distant humming distortion sound when played with my Emerald X-10 and my Ovation Custom Legend. It does not do so with mob other guitars, even those that have a battery pre-amp as in the Ovation and the Emerald, but they are tow of my most used instruments, so I fear I will have to find another wireless system. I am surprised because I played my Emerald through a friend's Link system this fall, which is what made me want to order a set. It is too bad, because In like your products, have three of your amps and they have worked out great, but this system does not seem to do the job for me.

I still have not received the carry bag for my Spark 2 amp. I placed the order on 11-25-25. I am told that the bag has shipped, however the shipping tracking shows that the bag has been sitting in Ontario Ca for 5 days and it hasn’t moved. Am I ever going to get my order completed?
